sub_title: Software Development Manager | Product Owner | Programme Manager
summary: IT professional experienced in managing geographically dispersed international Development Teams, delivering multi-national projects while working closely with Business Product Owners to ensure solid and on-time deliveries.

school.name: Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University
Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University

profile_positions.description:
- Legacy System Replacement with a 3rd Party solution complemented with a BPM based component with Web UI operating on Oracle RDBMS and utilized ESB for all internal and external integration with heavy message exchanges.

Involvement in the Requirements Gathering phase directly with the team (with an offshore extension), design & development progress through Daily Scrum Meetings, planning of software releases, co-ordination of work with System Integration Test Teams and User Acceptance Test Teams – formal tracking of issues / change requests (Jira).

The automation of more than 50 Business Processes were achieved resulting in significant productivity increase in the handling of customers contracts.

- Build up of a Content Store to `discover leads` by crawling  – managed a team of different technical profiles (Java Back-End, MS SQLServer).

The objective of automated data set up was achieved allowing more potential customers to be brought on board.
profile_positions.title: Software Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
In Programme Office Manager profile managed and coordinated the roll-out of the Core System to World Directories (was a leading local search and advertising company operating in Belgium, Ireland, Netherlands, Portugal, Puerto Rico and South Africa through print, online and mobile channels) Business Units in Ireland and South Africa as well as the support for regular upgrades of the Core System both on the functional and on the technical fronts in all World Directories Business Units.

Management of projects with varying scales – continuous software deliveries addressing new Business Requirements, technical upgrades; users training & User Acceptance Testing; production support.
profile_positions.title: Development Manager / Product Manager / Programme Office Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Participated in the delivery of a Yellow Pages Directory publication system for a newly set up Business Unit of World Directories in Turkey by addressing necessary customization / localization requirements on a 3rd Party solution.
- Participated in the establishment of a `standards framework` for the replacement of the legacy 3rd Party solution.
- Participated in the introduction and development of World Directories Corporate Data Model (CDM), the domain model for World Directories Business Applications to enable extensive system re-use across World Directories Business Units.
- Participated as one of the principal players in the formulation of key components for a Core System (a Windows application) to replace the legacy 3rd Party solution in World Directories Business Units leading to the emergence of new system products portfolio. 
- Participated in the analysis, design and development of the Contract Processing System as the first delivery of this Core System, being the most intricate and central component. 
- Participated in the roll-out of the Core System to World Directories Business Units in Portugal and Puerto Rico initially and later to the Business Unit in the Netherlands.
- Participated in the support for regular upgrades of the Core System both on the functional and on the technical fronts.

- In Internal ISO9000 Auditor profile (appointed as an Internal Auditor) contributed to Quality Assurance in the IT organization through various assignments - conducted internal ISO9000 Audits through which made major contributions in the implementation of the Quality System in the IT organization and contributed in obtaining successful results in KEMA’s ISO9001 surveillance audits.
profile_positions.title: Senior Systems Analyst & Designer / Project Leader / ISO9000 Auditor
